title: ダイヤモンドSの後に・準備は万全！

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Alright!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I gave it my all!
I did, Trainer!
(Whoa...!)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Wow, Matikanetannhauser can show such intensity!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Come to think of it, I heard a rumor she's actually quite the hard worker!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Looks can be deceiving, or rather, wow, that was a great race!
The 'Diamond Stakes' closed its curtains with more excitement than anyone imagined.

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Yes, hello. Yes, the race just ended—... Huh?

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: A transfer to another department...!?

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: B-but, well, I've finally started to understand the Umamusume scene, and I'm really finding it fulfilling right now—!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: ...Yes, you're right. I'm sorry. ...Understood.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Taaaah—!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, huff...
Ahaha, my lungs hurt~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whee~...
choice_data_list: It's after the race, so don't push yourself.
It's after the race, so take it easy.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you! But I still have to finish today's quota for self-training!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For the upcoming 'Emperor's Award (Spring)', my skills still aren't enough, you know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —Alright, I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Tah~!
Next up is the 'Emperor's Award (Spring)'. I want to support her with all my might!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer, please go on ahead! I think you must be tired~!
